legal group South AmericaMark Today Brett Wiggs told me that there will be a significant number of cuts on our Brazil staff including Legal within the next couple of weeks He asked me to think about a new structure to assist a small commercial team I asked about John Novak and he said he will probably end up being repatriated and you will become General Counsel I was obviously a bit puzzled about his commentsquestions and since he was travelling to the Eletrobolt site today I asked for some time before giving him any answers I wanted to know from you if this is something I should discuss with Brett Wiggs only or youBrett or youBrettNovak or If the Brazil office remains openalive focusing primarily on power marketing activities I am sure that Karla Azevedo and I could handle all the business guys However I anticipate that within the next couple of months there will be plenty of corporate work to be done in the near future such as Central Bank and Board of Trade matters we would have to decide whether we keep Patricia Dutra inhouse OR whether to outsource all corporate institutional workload to outside counsel Id rather keep Patricia Dutra until everything is worked out well as well as a lot of legal work to do on the Eletrobolt financing where Luiz Watanabe and his trainee Aline Merone are focused Id very much appreciate it if you could find a few minutes to provide me with your thoughts on the matter I know we are all going through heavy turbulence these days sorry to bother you with this matter Tks Rgds Sami

Legal OffsiteAfter last nights US and Great Britain retaliation against Taliban and Bin Laden forces I am extremely concerned about travelling to Houston at this point in time Houston is not only George Ws hometown are but it is also one of the US cities with a very large community of muslims Hope not but it could certainly be one of the next targets for terrorists attacks Unfortunately Ive already suffered NYC immigration problems in the s during the Gulf War and would rather not face it again You have no idea what is like to be questioned by immigration officers take your clothes off in a small office and have your luggage carefully searched Syrian name Italian passport Brazilian residence To me todays situation is a lot more complicated than the Gulf War Thank you in advance for understanding my personal decision of not travelling to Houston for the seminar Regards Sami Forwarded by Sami ArapSAEnron on PM Vicky Martinez PM To John nron Sami nron Luiz nron cc Mark E HaedickeHOUECT Subject Legal Offsite I spoke with Mark Haedicke today regarding the recent developments in Afganistan He advised that there is no Enron prohibition or advisory regarding travel to Houston for the offsite for our group but he is leaving the decision up to each individual based on comfort level and personal considerations I have decided to travel but wanted to advise you of my conversation with Mark Regards Vicky

Light Call Option of MWFYI still under discussions between Enron and Light This deal is similar to the Duke Call Options we closed last month Id rather do it under a Master Agreement and will check with the business guys if we can do so Rgds Sami Forwarded by Sami ArapSAEnron on PM Eduardo Cancian PM To Paul nronXGate Xochitl nronXGate Tanya RohauerHOUECT Mary nronXGate cc Roberto nron Dilma nron Sami nron Subject Light Call Option of MW ECE is negotiating the sale of a Call Option to Light the distribution company in Rio de Janeiro owned by EDF See below a summary of the main terms of this deal Seller ECE Buyer Light Volume MW Term January st to December st Structure Call Option details below Premium R MWh for the energy in and R MWh for the energy in The total premium will be R million and it will be paid upfront on the date of contract signature Strike Price R MWh for volume delivered during and R MWh for volume delivered in Prices will be adjusted by IGPM from Sept until the Exercise Date in both cases Exercise Date Buyer will have the right to exercise the Option on a weekly basis The notification of the exercise will have to be made until tuesday before beggining of supply week Guaranties Since its very difficult to get Corp Guaranty from European Companies we thought about asking Lights receivables as guaranty from Light and if necessary Enron Corp Guaranty from ECE Light has a years concession for electricity distribution in the city of Rio de Janeiro and is rated as a BB by SP Since it is not a small transaction we need to know if Credit Market risk and Tax are comfortable with the structure Im going to send more details about Light for Credit review Please let me know if you need any additional clarification Thanks Eduardo

Eucatex deal renegotiatedThis is just an example of how Enron got affected by ANEELs decision to lower the spot price from RMWh to RMWh This Eucatex deal involved both a fixed payment and a variable payment the latter based on a of the spot price Forwarded by Sami ArapSAEnron on AM Marcelo Parodi PM To Brett R nron Remi nron Joao Carlos nron Britaldo nron Sami nron Rubens nron Karla nron Roberto nron Ricardo nron Guy nron cc Orlando nron Subject Eucatex deal renegotiated Weve renegotiated the Eucatex deal in order to extract more value out of the transaction for Enron According to the new structure the value of the deal will move from a negative Umillion to a positive Umillion The old vs new conditions are as follow Old deal existing contract structure PPA Enron buys the power volumes MW MW firm up to MW interruptible pricing RMWh floor price of the upside against MAE prices term November to March October on interruptible basis guarantees R million surety bond issue by Malucelli Insurance Co Brazilian company New deal Structure Call Option Enron buys the call Volumes MW MW firm up to MW interruptible pricing RMWh premium RMWh strike Premium will be paid upfront to Eucatex Rmillion term same as above Interruptible power generated in October will be purchased for RMWh fixed price guarantees surety bond of Rmillion commercial exposure to be calculated by RAC We are also considering to switch Mallucelli for an international insurance company depending on RACs view Cost of the insurance will be paid by Eucatex It is also important to stress that obtaining a solid surety bond is a condition precedent on executing the deal and Eucatex is aware of that Rgds Marcelo

linked to interest rate and currency swaps can be effected The key issue of this structure is that the income tax on remittances to overseas that can be demonstrated to be remittances usual normal and necessary for hedging transactions on the international market can be reduced by In addition to any positive results for the foreign institutions from these operations the spread commissions premiums and other related sums when remitted abroad will not be subject to any income tax withholdings With respect to the tax treatment of losses that Brazilian companies may incur as a result of hedging linked to interest rate and currency swaps can be effected The key issue of this structure is that the income tax on remittances to overseas that can be demonstrated to be remittances usual normal and necessary for hedging transactions on the international market can be reduced by In addition to any positive results for the foreign institutions from these operations the spread commissions premiums and other related sums when remitted abroad will not be subject to any income tax withholdings With respect to the tax treatment of losses that Brazilian companies may incur as a result of hedging
